tool_description: Welcome to the Dowell Living Lab Chat API documentation! This API allows you to create chat rooms, send messages, and retrieve messages. Below, you’ll find explanations of the key features and how to use them.
name: Dowell Living Lab Chat API
title: Dowell Living Lab Chat API

api_list.name: getMessage
api_list.description: Returns all the messages within a given room

api_list.name: fetchPublicRoom
api_list.description: Retrieve all public room based on the room_id
